data.enText: to become healthy again; to make sth healthy again

data.chText: 伤口过了很长时间才愈合。
data.enText: It took a long time for the wounds to heal.
The cut healed up without leaving a scar.

data.chText: 这个会有助于治好割伤和擦伤。
data.enText: This will help to heal your cuts and scratches.

data.chText: 那是弥合党内创伤的机会。
data.enText: It was a chance to heal the wounds in the party (= to repair the damage that had been done) .

data.chText: 治愈（病人）；使又愉快起来
data.enText: to cure sb who is ill/sick; to make sb feel happy again

data.chText: 耶稣治愈十个麻风病人的故事
data.enText: the story of Jesus healing ten lepers of their disease

data.chText: 他的爱使我又快乐了起来。
data.enText: I felt healed by his love.
to put an end to sth or make sth easier to bear; to end or become easier to bear

data.chText: 她一直未能填平和她父亲之间的鸿沟。
data.enText: She was never able to heal the rift between herself and her father.

data.chText: 他们之间的裂痕从来没有真正弥合。
data.enText: The breach between them never really healed.

ex.chText: 这名牙医将治疗我的牙齿。
ex.enText: The dentist will treat my tooth.

ex.chText: 据说那种植物可用来治肝炎。
ex.enText: It is said that the plant can be used to treat hepatitis.

synonyms.bx: 普通用词，指用药物、手术等治疗疾病或创伤。

ex.chText: 现在没有办法治愈这种疾病。
ex.enText: There is no way to cure this disease.
The doctor failed to cure his cough.

ex.chText: 患者接受了一些针刺疗法，似乎把他的病给治好了。
ex.enText: The patient had some acupuncture treatment which seems to have cured him.

synonyms.bx: 指治愈疾病或病人，强调结果。

ex.chText: 这种植物有助于伤口愈合。
ex.enText: This plant will help to heal the wound.

ex.chText: 骨头愈合时将会连接在一起。
ex.enText: As they heal, the bones will fuse together.

synonyms.bx: 指（使）伤口、折断的骨头等愈合，又作 heal up。

tr: provide a cure for, make healthy again
example: The treatment cured the boy's acne
The quack pretended to heal patients but never managed to

value.def: When a broken bone or other injury heals or when something heals it, it becomes healthy and normal again.

example.ex: Within six weeks the bruising had gone, but it was six months before it all healed...
example.tran: 青瘀在6周内就消退了，但伤却是6个月后才全好了。

example.ex: If they'd operated and pinned her arm at once, she might have healed by now...
example.tran: 如果他们当时马上就给她的胳膊做手术并用钢针固定，她现在可能已经痊愈了。

example.ex: No doctor has ever healed a broken bone: he or she sets them...
example.tran: 从来没有哪个医生能治愈骨折，他们只是让骨头复位。

example.ex: Therapies like acupuncture do work and many people have been healed by them.
example.tran: 针灸等疗法确实有效，已经治愈了很多人。

value.def: When someone's emotional pain heals, they feel normal and happy again.

example.ex: A year later, she had healed to the point of at least being able to consider a romantic relationship with another man...
example.tran: 一年以后，她的感情创伤已慢慢愈合，至少能考虑和另一个男性开始恋爱关系了。

example.ex: Only by fully experiencing the depth of our pain can we be healed from it and be done with it.
example.tran: 只有充分感受了深切的痛苦，我们才能从中走出，并将它抛诸脑后。

value.tran: （感情创伤）愈合;（情感）恢复常态

value.def: If you heal something such as a rift or a wound, or if it heals, the situation is put right so that people are friendly or happy again.

example.ex: Today Sophie and her sister have healed the family rift and visit their family every weekend...
example.tran: 如今索菲和她的姐姐已经和家人和好，每个周末都回家探望他们。

example.ex: The psychological effects on the United States were immense and in Washington the wounds have still not fully healed.
example.tran: 对美国造成的心理影响是巨大的，在华盛顿创伤仍未完全弥合。

trans: 自修复；夏枯草；自我治愈；夏枯草花
